> <OLD>
>
> Hydras roared in pain and anger and his healds hold thier prey with more
> dettermination. A bean started to appear in their multiple headsa and fired.
> Hydras didnt care if he died at same time, he wouldnt bow to anyone!!!!

<NEW>

As the multiple beams erupt from the mouths of HYDRAS' 'heads'
MEGASTORM is blown backwards and sent sailing across the room as
several large cracks appear in his armor, especially where HYDRAS had
bit him.

MEGASTORM slowly got to his feet. "No! I will not be defeated by the
likes of you!" He said grimly. Shifting to his tank mode he oriented
his cannon on HYDRAS, "Just as soon as my canon charges I will will
atomize your chassis and ground it into dust!"

The front of MEGASTORM's canon began to glow as he charged up, the
very air starting to hum as the energy collected in his systems!

(TAG)

- Preston
